languages.text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} постричь сотню мальпийцев в Орден Молота, невзирая на протесты монахов.
The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} постричь сотню мальпийцев в Орден Молота, невзирая на протесты монахов.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to have a hundred Malpians admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

languages.text: Sans tenir compte des protestations des moines, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a ordonné qu'une centaine de Malpiens soient admis dans l'Ordre du Marteau.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

traits.locale_text: Sans tenir compte des protestations des moines, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a ordonné qu'une centaine de Malpiens soient admis dans l'Ordre du Marteau.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは、あらゆる抗議を無視して、100人のマルピア人を鉄槌の修道会に入団させるよう命じた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、あらゆる抗議を無視して、100人のマルピア人を鉄槌の修道会に入団させるよう命じた。

languages.text: 行商浪人罔顾来自修士的重重阻力，命令一百名马尔皮恩人加入重锤修会。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人罔顾来自修士的重重阻力，命令一百名马尔皮恩人加入重锤修会。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó que cien malpianos fueran admitidos en la Orden del Martillo, haciendo caso omiso de las protestas de los monjes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó que cien malpianos fueran admitidos en la Orden del Martillo, haciendo caso omiso de las protestas de los monjes.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, einhundert Malpianer in den Orden des Hammers aufzunehmen, und ignorierte die Proteste der Mönche dagegen schlicht.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, einhundert Malpianer in den Orden des Hammers aufzunehmen, und ignorierte die Proteste der Mönche dagegen schlicht.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, keşişlerin itirazlarına kulak tıkayarak yüz Malpili'nin Çekiç Tarikatı'na kabul edilmesini emretti.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that a hundred Malpians be admitted into the Order of the Hammer, ignoring the monks' protests.
